query.statement:
SELECT A.CS127_UPN AS UPN ,A.CS127_CST AS CST ,A.CS127_UPN AS PJT ,'Z99' AS HNO ,A.CS127_SEQ AS SEQ ,A.CS127_ISR AS ISR ,'»óÁÖ' AS GKD ,A.CS127_SFR AS USD ,A.CS127_SFR AS UGS ,A.CS127_STO AS UHJ ,A.CS127_GNO AS GNO ,A.CS127_ISR AS CODE ,B.ABR_NM AS CODE_NAME FROM SAPHEE.ZCST127 AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 AS B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.LGORT = CS127_BSU WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS127_UPN = #UPN# AND A.CS127_CST = #CST# AND A.CS127_GNO = #GNO# AND A.CS127_DDT = '' AND A.CS127_PST = 'A6'
WITH UR
